|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bytify(value, bytesLength)](./rain-sdk.vm.bytify.md) | <code>static</code> | Converts a value to raw bytes representation. Assumes <code>value</code> is less than or equal to 1 byte, unless a desired <code>bytesLength</code> is specified. |
